SCTX:
Begin fightDomba
 
short counter
Short NoLore
short doonceA
short doonceB

if ( CellChanged == 0 )
    Return
endif

;if ( counter < 20 )
;    Set counter to counter + 1
;    Return
    ;for speed...
;endif
 
;Set counter to 0

if ( doonceA == 0 )
	if ( GetDeadCount "Endroni Dalas" == 0 )
	        StartCombat "Endroni Dalas"
	        set doonceA to 1
	endif
endif

if ( doonceB == 0 )
	if ( GetDeadCount "Uresa Omoril" == 0 )
	        StartCombat "Uresa Omoril"
	        set doonceB to 1
	endif
endif

end fightDomba
